Changelog
=========

1.1.3 (2012-11-06)
-------------------

- Option for linkable


1.1.1 (2012-08-29)
-------------------

- Option for using thumbnail size


1.1 (2012-08-29)
-------------------

- Added option to set number of effects


1.0.1 (2012-08-28)
-------------------

- Added translations (en + no)
- Added effect on images when page is loaded


1.0 (2012-08-21)
-------------------

- Initial release
